text: Sock Club | Web Developer (Ruby on Rails, Javascript) | Austin, TX | FULL-TIME, ONSITE, custom.sockclub.com and www.sockclub.com The retail landscape is shifting it's reorganizing from around the automobile to around the smartphone. We are working to capitalize on this change by building a DNVB (digitally native vertical brand) and also working on the discovery problem for ecommerce. If you're interested in this opportunity contact me at dane@sotmclub.com
